message: HELLO MYNTRA, IT's REALLY SHAME ON YOUR PROCESS AND THE SERVICE THAT YOU PROVIDE TO CUSTOMER. YOUR POLICIES FOR THE REFUND AGAINST THE WARRANTY CLAIM IS REALLY STUPID.IS IT NOT THE MONEY THAT WE PAY TO YOU EVEN IF WE BUY THE PRODUCT IN A DISCOUNTED PRICE. WE DON'T BARTER OUR SHIT AGAINST YOUR PRODUCT THAT ARE SOLD IN DISCOUNTED PRICE. ITS OUR HARD EARNED MONEY THAT WE PAY, HOW CAN YOU EVEN SEND ME A DEFECTIVE AND LOW QUALITY PRODUCT.ON TOP OF IT YOU REFUSE AND DELAY IN RESPONDING TO MY EMAILS. TAKE BACK YOUR PRODUCT AND REFUND MY PRODUCT I HAVE ALREADY ESCALATED THE ISSUE WITH THE  LEADS IN YOUR SUPPORT TEAM NO RESPONSE. RIDICULOUS SERVICE FROM YOU MYNTRA. I AM NOT GOING TO SHOP FROM YOU ANY MORE. SETTLE MY AMOUNT SO THAT I WILL STOP NEGATIVE WORD FROM MY END.

How do I cancel a return request on Myntra?

Hi Everyone,
Glad and happy to inform you all Myntra have started to deliver the used/defective product, when I reached out to the customer care executive to inform this they happily took the complaint but I asked for the resolution they told it's not used product or manufacturing defect. Hence they cannot accept the return or exchange. Good you guys started cheating the people with used product. Get a life Myntra and start to do some good things which people always used to love shopping from your website. Order details Order No:1043488-1108119-9670803.
